text: “What was an anti-vaccine movement then morphed into a full-on anti-science movement”: the virologist @PeterHotez discusses why so many Americans are skeptical of vaccines. https://t.co/g0wzeVXJFd

text:
At Mark’s Off Madison, near Madison Square Park, hand-painted letters on a glass wall in the dining room advertise “Not Your Grandfather’s Bagels,” with “Not” crossed out.
